# Package `vame`


`vame` makes it simpler to define and make use of metadata pertaining
to one more variables (e.g. a tabular dataset).

<!-- badges: end -->

# Recommended installation

```r
devtools::install_github(

  ref = readline("enter latest tag on github: ")

```
